duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage day-to-day operations and sales metrics for a fitness studio, actively pursuing new member enrollments and leads.
Establish and maintain community relationships, schedule classes, and manage the studio team.
Ensure high member satisfaction and frequency, while achieving maximum profitability for the franchise partner.
Resolve member concerns, conduct team member coaching, and monitor personal and team appearance to meet expectations.
Maintain cleanliness and order of the studio, responsible for bill collecting on member dues, and optimize merchandising and display.
Train and develop studio team, create daily routines to achieve financial goals, and ensure proper execution of lead and guest goals.
Supervise point-of-sales operations, resolve member service matters, and review time clock entries to manage labor budget.
Achieve monthly revenue objectives, ensure timely and consistent follow-up on all sales inquiries, and report on the performance of marketing campaigns.
Directly supervise employees, interact with the membership team, members, and all staff, and maintain fully engaged and high-performing team aligned with company values and goals.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED / Four-year degree in a related field preferred
